events.name: Professional Grooming Series: Hair Styling and Makeup Workshop for Job Interviews and the Working World
events.desc: Do you know one’s personal impression can be made in just seven seconds? Wonder how to upgrade your image by having a professional hairstyle and makeup? Join the workshop and meet experienced hairstylists and product specialist who will demonstrate how to make an appropriate hair-style and makeup for job interview and workplace. Basic tips on hair and skin care will also be covered. Let’s join the workshop to optimize your appearance for career success!
